channel.title: Quantify - Rate Time in Real Time
channel.description: Realtime rating while shooting. Effortlessly timestamp those moments you know are gold. Easily drop the data into the edit to save hours, with Quantify.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hello and welcome to Quantify! Weâ€™re excited to be sharing a tool with you that has saved us so much time.

Here is where we will be posting notable milestones. Subscribe to our RSS feed to stay up to date. If you would like even more frequent Quantify news, follow us on Twitter at @quantifytime and on Instagram at @quantify_time.

Best,
Jake, Jed, and Ryan
